title: Rune Wars Renekton
body: Anyone know when this skin is next going to be possible to buy, I just want to make sure I've got RP at that time so I don't miss it again, thanks.

replies.body:
Rune Wars Renekton was recently moved to the [legacy vault](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) sadly. It will only be available during certain special events or in mystery gifts.

:(
Ah, damn. Prehistoric it is then :)
